snippet: “Human Resources,” on Pivot, is a workplace reality series that offers an example of meaningful work for millennials.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews Pivot television series Human Resources.
lead_paragraph: “Human Resources,” on Pivot, is a workplace reality series that offers an example of meaningful work for millennials.

headline.seo: ‘Human Resources’ on Pivot, Gives Hope to the Working Young
headline.main: Making the Best of Trash, While Finding Meaning
